title: The Princess and the Bear
description: When Big Bear takes a nap, his snores echo across the land, disturbing the other animals.Princess Silk comes down from her castle in the clouds to see what is causing the noise. She wants to help. What will she do?This beautifully illustrated children's book combines vivid images with soothing color to guide your little ones to dreamland.Featuring memorable characters and a story celebrating ingenuity and improvisation, The Princess and the Bear is a bedtime fairy tale to be shared again and again.
author: Fitri Silman
